title: Advanced Diagnostics - Intermittent Packet Loss
description: A customer with a business account reports intermittent packet loss affecting their VoIP service.

tasks.description: Identify the business customer and their service details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the account and service.

tasks.description: Initiate a 15-minute remote line monitoring session to capture real-time quality metrics.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully starts the line monitoring tool.

tasks.description: Analyze the monitoring results to confirm packet loss and identify the network segment where it originates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent analyzes the report and determines the packet loss is occurring at a specific network node.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority trouble ticket for the network engineering team with the monitoring logs attached.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed ticket and assigns it to the correct engineering queue.
